title: Why isn't my Logitech G13 working
body:
I have been trying to use my Logitech G13 since i got it a week ago and i cant seem to use it with LoL, i have made profiles for it and went into game settings and still no luck. I heard it is easier for game like LoL and that is the main reason i got it. 
Please help

replies.body:
I got a G13 4 months ago, for me the problem was that I didnt lock the Lol profile (I also saved the profile in the G13 internal memory)
Now is working fine (its also nice to see the game stats in the G13's screen :D )

I've never personally configured a G13 to run with League, but I'd imagine it should work if you program the keys to copy actions on your regular keyboard. So for example, you could bind G1-6 to Keys 1-6 to use your items in-game. 

If that doesn't work, you may need to [get in contact with Logitech](http://support.logitech.com/en_us/home) about making configurations that work with League. Let me know if you have any questions.
